LB 		BASE 	RT 		offset
100000 	00000 	01101 0000000000011011
[13]=27

LBU 	BASE 	RT 		offset
100100 	00000 	11011 0000000000010011
[27]=19

ADDU 	RS 		RT 		RD
000000 01101 	11011 	01111 00000 100001
[15]=[13]+[27] = 27+19 = 46->2e

LHU 	BASE 	RT 		OFF
100101 	00001 	00100 0000000000001010
[4] = 
LHU		BASE 	RT 		offset 
100101 	00000 00010 0000001111111111

SH		BASE 	RT 		offset
101001 	00000 00010 0000000000000011
[3] = [2] HW

SB		BASE 	RT 		offset
101000 	00000 00010 0000000000000100
[4] = [2] B
